root.name: MUD: FIM Motocross World Championship
root.description: OverviewThe game features 84 real riders and 32 teams with the official Motocross World Championship license. Also features dynamic terrain deformation, trick system and official race circuits from the Motocross World Championship.System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows®XP™ SP2, Windows®Vista™ or Windows®7Processor: Intel™ 2.4 GHz or similar.Memory: 1 GB RAMGraphics: NVIDIA® Geforce 8800 GT, AMD® Radeon™ HD 3870 or higher (it must be able to manage Pixel Shader 3.0) with at least 512MB of display memory.DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 4 GB HD spaceOther Requirements: Broadband Internet connectionRecommendedOS: Windows®XP™ SP2, Windows®Vista™ or Windows®7Processor: Intel™ Core 2 Duo / AMD™ Athlon 64 X2 or higher.Memory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ 9000 series or higher, AMD® Radeon™ HD4000 series or higher (it must be able to manage Pixel Shader 3.0) with at least 512MB of display memory.DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 4 GB HD spaceOther Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
